recipesJson.name: Purple  Lemonade
recipesJson.author: COB
recipesJson.description:
Basic purple lemonade.  One of my earlier mixes, still a favorite of many I mix for.
Cooling agents, as always, are "to taste" due to varying tolerances.

reviews.text: Love this lemonade base. You can throw so many flavours on top of it and you're on to a winner - with INW Grapes being one of the elites.
